titleStmt.title: Description of An inscription on an oaken board.

availability.licence: This metadata, accompanying images, and the content of London, British Library, Oriental Manuscripts Or 6302: An inscription on an oaken board. are free of known copyright restrictions and in the public domain. notesStmt.note: Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: An inscription on an oaken board.

layout.p: Columns: 1; ruled lines: 2; written lines: 2; Contains five nails with which the board had been fixed to a wall.Three straight lines cut into the wood over the inscription, two between the two lines if incised writing, and one under the inscription.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Hebrew square script of the 11th to 12th century (inscription).

history.provenance: Acquisition: Acquired by the British Museum in 1897.
